issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Logging
components.description: Tracks issues dealing with logging and log messages.

fields.summary: Excessive logging when ORC PPD fails type conversions

comments.body: [~gopalv]/[~sseth] Can someone please take a look? This patch avoids logging the full stacktrace.
LGTM - but can you include a LOG.debug(reason, e) so that this is actually logged during qtests?
